projects.title: Bon Voyage
projects.description: Bon Voyage is an application for planning travel with friends. Users can log in and create trips to plan trip dates, destinations, consolidate hotel information, etc, all in one place.

projects.title: Weather Forecast
projects.description: A simple weather site built to practice accessing data through an API and displaying it on a page.
